:mod:`sknet`
==================

.. automodule:: sknet

.. toctree::
    :hidden:

    base/base



All the :py:class:`sknet.layer` inherit from this base class. Its documentation
presents all the details about thegeneral behaviors of the layers.

    Tensor
    ObservedTensor

.. autosummary::
    :nosignatures:

    Worker
